name: Breath of Life (Camerono98, rsellars)
description:
Breath of Life is an explorative puzzle game for Android mobile devices. The game draws on themes of the afterlife, life and reincarnation. Players take on the role of the wind, or 'Guardian,' and guide lost souls within limbo back to their dying bodies. Players must navigate mazelike environments and avoid evil spirits that seek to destroy lost souls. Players will have to carefully manage their air, as well as be mindful of the time remaining before the poor soul is lost forever.

Game Credits:

Rhys Sellars – Project Creator/Level Art/Level Designer/Assitant Programmer

Cameron Ogilvie – Programmer

Chantel Levin - Graphic Artist: UI/Logo

James Chandler - Graphic Artist: Spirits

Corey Taylor - Audio
